name: Siddhalepa Inhaler
description:
This is a popular product based on the Siddhalepa formula. It was specially developed and designed with emphasis on the unique aroma of the product. Ingredients - Cinnamomum zeylanicum, Cinnamomum camphora, Eucalyptus globulus, Cymbopogon nardus, Mentha arvensis.
 *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
